solution_line_template: If Zack's classroom had {students_when_zack_absent} students when he was absent, then the total students in his class are {students_when_zack_absent}+{zack_present_increase} = <<{students_when_zack_absent}+{zack_present_increase}={total_zack_students}>>{total_zack_students}
Because T = M, then T is also T={maura_students}.

Between the three classes then we have a total of T+M+Z or {tina_students}+{maura_students}+{total_zack_students}=<<{tina_students}+{maura_students}+{total_zack_students}={total_students_all_classes}>>{total_students_all_classes}
